results.title: [A case of drug-induced pneumonia possibly associated with simvastatin].
results.text_hl: The percentage of peripheral blood eosinophils was elevated. After @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ was discontinued and administration of @CHEMICAL_Prednisolone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011239 @@@prednisolone@@@ was started, @DISEASE_Eosinophilia @DISEASE_MESH:D004802 @@@eosinophilia@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Reticular_dysgenesis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C538361 @@@reticular shadows@@@ improved.

citations.NLM: Yoshioka S, Mukae H, Ishii H, Nakayama S, Hisatomi K, Ishimoto H, Kakugawa T, Sugiyama K, Ide M, Kohno S. [A case of drug-induced pneumonia possibly associated with simvastatin]. Nihon Kokyuki Gakkai Zasshi. 2005 Oct;43(10):600-4. PMID: 16285592
